mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUESTION_BOARD (NO, CATE_NO,WRITER,TITLE,CONTENT,ENROLL_DATE, DELETE_YN,MODIFY_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_QUESTION_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL,#{category},#{writer},#{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE,'N',SYSDATE)
mapper.select:
SELECT Q.NO,Q.CATE_NO,C.NAME as CATE_NAME,Q.TITLE,Q.ENROLL_DATE ,M.NICK AS WRITER FROM QUESTION_BOARD Q JOIN COMMON_CATEGORY C ON Q.CATE_NO= C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = Q.WRITER WHERE CATE_NO = ${cateNo}
and ${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'
SELECT M.NICK AS WRITER ,Q.ENROLL_DATE,C.NAME as CATE_NAME,Q.TITLE,Q.CONTENT FROM QUESTION_BOARD Q JOIN COMMON_CATEGORY C ON Q.CATE_NO= C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = Q.WRITER WHERE Q.NO = #{no}
